00335         bool accepted = false;
00336         while(password.dialog->exec())
00337         {
00338             if(password.firstLineEdit->text() == password.secondLineEdit->text())
00339             {
00340                 PDFPasswordString = password.firstLineEdit->text();
00341                 accepted = true;
00342                 break;
00343             }
00344             password.label->setText("<nobr>The passwords did not match.  Try again.</nobr>");
00345         }
00346         delete password.dialog;
00347 
00348         if(!accepted)
00349             return string;
00350     }

00352     if(PDFPaperSize == 0)
00353         string += "--size letter ";
00354     if(PDFPaperSize == 1)
00355         string += "--size a4 ";
00356     if(PDFPaperSize == 2)
00357         string += "8.27x11.69in ";
00358     if(PDFPaperSize == 3)
00359     {
00360         string += "--size " + PDFPaperSizeWidth + "x" + PDFPaperSizeHeight;
00361         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 0)
00362             string += "in ";
00363         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 1)
00364             string += "cm ";
00365         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 2)
00366             string += "mm ";
00367     }
00368 
00369     if(PDFPassword || PDFPermissionsNoPrint || PDFPermissionsNoModify || PDFPermissionsNoCopy || PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00370         string += "--encryption ";
00371 
00372     if(PDFPassword)
00373         string += "--user-password \"" + PDFPasswordString + "\" ";
00374 
00375     if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint || PDFPermissionsNoModify || PDFPermissionsNoCopy || PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00376     {
00377         if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint)
00378             string += "--permissions no-print ";
00379         if(PDFPermissionsNoModify)
00380             string += "--permissions no-modify ";
00381         if(PDFPermissionsNoCopy)
00382             string += "--permissions no-copy ";
00383         if(PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00384             string += "--permissions no-annotate ";
00385     }
00386 
00387     settings->setPDFPaperSize(PDFPaperSize);
00388     settings->setPDFPaperSizeWidth(PDFPaperSizeWidth);
00389     settings->setPDFPaperSizeHeight(PDFPaperSizeHeight);
00390     settings->setPDFPaperSizeUnits(PDFPaperSizeUnits);
00391     settings->setPDFPassword(PDFPassword);
00392     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoPrint(PDFPermissionsNoPrint);
00393     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoModify(PDFPermissionsNoModify);
00394     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoCopy(PDFPermissionsNoCopy);
00395     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoAnnotate(PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate);
00396 
00397     return string;

00399 
00400 void PDFOptions::paperSizeChanged(int index)
00401 {
00402     if(index != 3)
00403     {
00404         options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit->setEnabled(false);
00405         options.paperSizeCustomBetweenLabel->setEnabled(false);
00406         options.paperSizeCustomHeightLineEdit->setEnabled(false);
00407         options.paperSizeCustomUnitsComboBox->setEnabled(false);
00408     }
00409     else
00410     {
00411         options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit->setEnabled(true);
00412         options.paperSizeCustomBetweenLabel->setEnabled(true);
00413         options.paperSizeCustomHeightLineEdit->setEnabled(true);
00414         options.paperSizeCustomUnitsComboBox->setEnabled(true);
00415     }
00416 }
00417 
00418 void PDFOptions::passwordNoClicked()
00419 {
00420     options.passwordYesRadioButton->setChecked(false);
00421     options.passwordNoRadioButton->setChecked(true);
00422 }
00423 
00424 void PDFOptions::passwordYesClicked()
00425 {
00426     options.passwordNoRadioButton->setChecked(false);
00427     options.passwordYesRadioButton->setChecked(true);
00428 }
